doc:
Carol Arthur https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carol_Arthur 0 Carol Arthur (born August 4, 1935) is an American actress, mainly recognizable as playing supporting roles in films produced by Mel Brooks. She is probably best remembered as the outspoken town school teacher Harriett Johnson ("You are the leading asshole in the state!"), in Brooks' Blazing Saddles. She has also guest-starred in many television shows from the mid 1970s to the mid 2000s, including The Dom DeLuise Show, Emergency!, Sanford and Son, Rhoda, Alice, Steven Spielberg's Amazing Stories, St. Elsewhere and 7th Heaven. During the late 1970s and early 1980s, Arthur appeared as "Safety Sadie", the spokeswoman for the United States Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) in several television and radio public service announcements. Arthur was born Carol Arata in Hackensack, New Jersey, the daughter of Mildred (née Foehl) and Peter Arata, a police officer. She is the widow of Dom DeLuise and the mother of actors Peter DeLuise, Michael DeLuise and David DeLuise. Carol_Arthur ( born August_4_,_1935 ) is an_American_actress , mainly recognizable as playing supporting_roles in films produced by Mel_Brooks . She is_probably_best_remembered as the_outspoken_town_school_teacher_Harriett_Johnson ( " You are the_leading_asshole in the_state ! " ) , in Brooks '_Blazing_Saddles . She has_also_guest-starred in many_television_shows from the_mid_1970s to the_mid_2000s , including The_Dom_DeLuise_Show , Emergency ! , Sanford_and_Son , Rhoda , Alice , Steven_Spielberg 's_Amazing_Stories , St._Elsewhere and 7th Heaven . During the_late_1970s and early_1980s , Arthur appeared as " Safety_Sadie " , the_spokeswoman for the_United_States_Consumer_Product_Safety_Commission_(_CPSC_) in several_television_and_radio_public_service_announcements . Arthur was_born Carol_Arata in Hackensack , New_Jersey , the_daughter of Mildred_(_née_Foehl_) and Peter_Arata , a_police_officer . She is the_widow of Dom_DeLuise and the_mother of actors_Peter_DeLuise , Michael_DeLuise and David_DeLuise .
